content.detailedDescription: Looked up and thought it was a bright star till it started to move. i seen a couple of planes moving at a slower past and this was a lot brighter then a plane or a satilight.
content.summary: Bright light.

content.detailedDescription:
We live under the east to west commercial flightpath and approximately 3-miles from an afb to the south. i have seen several uap's along the flightpath over the last few months. red orbs: at least 3. white orbs: 2.  one red orb flew south in the direction of march afb, then returned northward towards the big dipper. 

the object(s) appeared at first to be landing lights, but fainter and further apart. then both became extremely bright as they appeared to interact with each other near a group of colored orbs. some orbs left a greenish trail.

using a nikon d5100 and 18-200 lens set at 200mm and f5.6, i captured several images, both before, during the "event", and after.  the orbs emitted a brownish corkscrew trail at the end of the interaction, then darkened and faded out. total time: around two minutes

nope, not landing lights. or swamp gas.
content.summary: Flight path uaps exhibit striking shift in brightness as they interract with colored orbs

content.detailedDescription: As i was driving home from work, taking the same streets i always do, at around 9:45 at night as i was aproching the intersection of willard st and route 113, it was a red light so i was taking my time to get to it. i happened to look up and saw three white lights in a perfect triangle moving in a straight line across the sky. about as bright as the lights you'd expect from a helecopter or airplane but dead silent and never wavering from the perfect triangle form. i followed it to the street light and as i continued to watch from inside my vehicle the three lights began to fade one by one. starting in the rear right corner the lights went out one at a time ending with the on in the front.
content.summary: 3 lights in triangle one by one went out

content.detailedDescription: On a cold january night in east tennessee my father(40 years old),his friend(also about 40) and my self(about 10) were returning home after a long night of hunting. as we headed up a road called rocky branch rd in walland i noticed a strange anomaly of lights just beside a farm house. this area is very rural and secluded in the mountains so air traffic is not very prevalent. as we approached the top of the hill i prompted my father to stop the truck and look at the lights. the craft was a definite triangle with a glowing blue light mounted on each corner, we watched for an hour or so as the craft just hovered there no more that 30 feet up. we were racoon hunting so we also had dogs in the back of the truck and rather than bark they were howling as we sat there watching. these people are very closed minded and to this day my father nor his friend will publicly admit what they saw but we often discuss it in private. what prompted me to report this event so many years later is the feed back i got when i talked about it with some of the other men that live in this little area. when i asked about it a man in his 50s told me about seeing the same lights in the same area when he was a kid every detail the same before i had even told him my story. in the 70's everyone was seeing this anomaly and referd to it as the "nebo lights" do to the mountain where my sighting occurred being called nebo mountain. i have not seen it again since then but will update if it happens again. the photo attached is the closest image i could find to what i bore witness to.
content.summary: Triangle shaped craft hovering less than 30 feet from ground. 3 lighs.

content.detailedDescription: I was outside.  observing this bright star-like that comes and goes.  (around a month)  as i am looking a very close quiet object flies over me.   i would not have seen if it i was not looking in that direction.  this month dallas's sky has been amazing and mysterious to view.  these pictures were all taken right after each other while observing the bright star-like object.
content.summary: Flying object near hovering star-like object

content.detailedDescription:
My four life altering events are the following.  it was about two weeks after the superbowl, a weds morning about 1:30am in 2014.  i couldn't sleep, so i went to the back yard to smoke a cigarette.  i sat down on our rode iron chairs with over stuffed pillows, relaxed, put my head back and was looking at sky at a north east direction.  looking at all the stars was beautiful, suddenly one star just a little touch to the right got very bright.  i turned my head just one click to the right and starred at the star.  then to my shock that star drew one line in the sky about one inch wide.  it was like a huge florescent light in the sky.  then that brightness shot up and made a rectangle standing up, except that it had a triangular streak, wide at the bottom and going across the center of the rectangle, in the middle.  the rectangle has so bright it lit up the entire neighborhood, as if it were day time.  i did not take my eyes off of it for one second.  i starred inside and noticed it was circular and smooth inside.  as if i were looking into a cigar shaped object. inside was the whitest white you can ever imagine.  inside the rectangular circular thing was what i can only call a space ship.  it was dull silver, really banged up.  it was sectioned.  like one cone on top of another cone. so, i saw the first three sections  of the ship.  it was huge!  as big as los angeles, itself! this was a mother ship cloaked from human eyes.  i looked deep inside the object and say the first 3 sections of the space craft. it was obviously floating in the center of the cigar shaped cloaked object.  this all lasted about 7 seconds, but they were the longest 7 seconds of my life. then it zipped down, accross to the original starting point and dimmed like all other stars.  that star still remains and i feel it is a port hole for them to look at us and observe.

  then about 10 days later, i went to the backyard at around 6:30pm.  the sun was setting and i was sitting in the same chair.  relaxed looking up at the sky, then i noticed something bright in the sky about 3 clicks to the right or east. this bright light started to go around and around until it was one firey  circle. as if it were cutting thru some stuffing.  then suddenly that same real bright flourescent light appeared or shot out from the middle of the firey circle. i then saw what looked like a flea fly out from the middle. the light turned off and the firey circle started slowing down until it came to a stop and dissapeared. 

  about 6 months ago i saw what looked like a bright light streak above my house, i was in the back yard. it went higher and higher, until it left our atmosphere with a firey blast.  i heard the same click when it left our atmosphere, again as if turning off an oxygen based propulsion and changing into some outer space kind of propulsion (sounds like ion based propulsion).  the trouble is that it veered to the right above our atmosphere catching the sun's rays high above our night sky. i saw that it was a triangular craft with one large engine in the back. i did hear and felt a click when it left our atmosphere, as if shutting down an oxygen based propulsion and turning on a space based propulsion system. 

  my last encounter was just days ago, when i saw the same kind of object leaving our atmosphere, except that this time the exhaust aimed directly at me as i felt the propulosion and warmth of the force. i still see reflective objects in my eyes, as if someone took a flash picture at you and you see stuff for days.  there is a strange sensation in the back of my brain ever since.

  finally, about 3 days after christmas in 2013 i saw a super nova in orians belt. in between the two left stars.  i felt a huge waive of sadness. it was overwhelming.  as if a whole civilization was destroyed and what was left weaped in sorrow.  i believe these people have known a close star was going super nova close to their home world soon. they have been preparing for this inevitable moments for over 3,000 years.  this is why they have been visiting us and why they are here now. how i know this?  i don't know but it does all add up.
content.summary: 4 life altering events.

content.detailedDescription: on 06/09/2015 at approx. 3 p.M. i was parked in my vehicle within the parking lot of my daughters' elementary school awaiting dismissal at 3:15 p.M. my vehicle was facing east and all windows were down. a minor motor vehicle accident had occurred within the lot about ten minutes earlier and had the attention of most people present. i looked up out of my driver's window at the dark, blackened thunderclouds which were moving in from the west. i observed a shiny, chrome oval/bean shape ascending slowly in a northerly direction. i believed the object to be a mylar balloon. it was several hundred feet away.  the object then pulsated a bright red light for about about 2 seconds. it wasn't really a flash. i thought that the sun must be reflecting off of a picture on this balloon. but then it pulsed red again as it continued ascending. it was almost as if it was blinking on and off like aircraft beacon lights. the pulses became more rapid as it went higher towards the cloud. at this point i thought that perhaps it was a large drone with lights and not a balloon. i realized that the object was too large to be a mylar balloon for me to be able to still see it well at the distance it now was(over 500 feet away). but the oval/bean shape was wrong for a drone. as this object was approaching the black cloud i then observed a similar bright, pulsing red light come from within the cloud. this light was more muted as it was within the cloud. i saw no second object, just that light. the first object then pulsed red one more time and ascended into the cloud. i did not see any objects or lights after that. i don't know what i saw in this fleeting moment. i did not take any photo or video. i did not report this to any local authorities. my three year old daughter was with me in vehicle. the object was definitely unusual, but what puzzles me is the light in the cloud.
content.summary: Observed object ascending slowly towards thundercloud, pulsating a glowing red light. observed a second red light glow within cloud. first object then entered cloud.

content.detailedDescription:
I was lying in bed with all my light off, trying to fall asleep. i looked out my window and noticed the half moon shining bright in the sky - all i thought was it looked lovely. i looked at it again a few minutes later and it took a few minutes for my mind to process that to the right and a little under the  half moon, about three to five miles away at cloud level, was a flat, grey, rectangular object hovering gracefully in the sky.

i stared at it for a few more moments before turning the led light on on my phone and then going to the window to see it better. i thought it might be a cloud of some sort and that as i got up and changed my position in comparison to the object, it would fade away. i thought it was maybe a glint of light through my window from the moon. but as i looked through the screen of my open window, and not the glass, the object was still there. so it definitely wasn't a glint of light.

also, the edges of the object were sharp and straight, and the rectangle was hovering evenly as if it were a levitating book. i immediately contacted some of my friends, telling them about it.

when i looked at it a few minutes later, it seemed to have been covered in shadows, but i still could see the light glinting off the edge.

prior that night, around ten o clock, many people across the county (they posted about it on facebook) had seen three orange/yellow lights hovering in the sky. my dad explained it away as being flares, a gadget used by the military over battlefields, as he said he used to drop them all the time when he worked in the military.

perhaps he's right, maybe not. i haven't read into.

i stayed on the phone with my friend, after hanging a blanket over my windows out of a strange feeling and presence i got from the ufo, for about twenty minutes. when i looked out of my window, it was gone.

I was outside taking pictures of the storm clouds coming in. the next thing was this object coming out through the clouds like it was trying to hide using the clouds as cover. i have seen ufos since i was a kid , but i have never seen one like this it is totally unique .
content.summary: Was outside snapping pics of incoming storm cloud this object flew in and out of the clouds you can actually see the clouds in front of the craft.

content.detailedDescription:
I was star gazing in my yard just after 9pm and there was heavy air traffic into and out of the local sf/oak area airports.
i saw a faint white light to the south and it immediately struck me that it was too high to land but was flying right over top of the incoming jets.
even though it appeared to be maybe 30k feet high, it was moving almost 3x faster than a normal jet. 
i began to think that i may have spotted something strange so i watched it quickly race across the sky in a straight line from around san jose up to hayward.
it didn't make any noise and it never blinked. the light wasn't bright, it was kind of a faint light with no trails. it never got brighter or changed color, just a steady dull white glow. it flew a very straight line and i kept watching it until it was a couple miles north of me.
as i was watching, i blinked my eyes a couple times and when i looked again it was gone and i could not see it in the sky although there was nothing to obscure my vision.
it silently flew from south to north emitting only a steady light and a very fast speed then it simply disappeared or turned off it's light.
if it was an airplane, it did not have legal lights on it and it was travelling at 2-3 times the rate of an airliner and flying over sfo/oakland airport traffic at an altitude of at least 30,000'.
content.summary: Saw a single non-blinking whitish light very high moving at a very fast speed

content.detailedDescription: On 8 june 2015 at approximately 940 pm my daughter and i witnessed what appeared to be 8 brightly lit orange lights in the shape of a long rectangle. there were 4 lights and then a separation with 4 more lights.  the lights were approximately 2000 ft in the sky and stationary.  they remained stationary for at least ten minutes then 4 of the lights went out and disappeared. the night sky was crystal clear. the lights were extremely bright and appeared to be the size of navel orange if you were holding it in front of your face.  after about 1 minute the lights appeared again but this time there were only three and the object appeared to have moved lower to the ground.  these lights were fixed and bright in the sky. they were not commercial or private aircraft.  the orlando airport is located to the southeast these objects were due south and remained stationary for more than 15 minutes.  we will attempt to upload video which we have of the objects taken with an iphone 6. the object or object was located over lake toho and to the south of poinciana florida. i have never seen anything like this before.
content.summary: 8 brightling lit lights pefectly round then 4 disappeared and reappeared was rectangul

content.detailedDescription:
June 8th 2015.

yesterday evening i was driving in crow edge, near sheffield. it was around 7pm but still a bright evening with no clouds in the sky. 

i usually have my head in the sky these days due to a similar sighting a few weeks ago at home. i was driving on a section of the road that was pretty straight, and in my eyeline i saw what looked like a bright star just straight ahead but seemed to be high in the sky. i usually would have passed it off as a bright star but it was way too sunny still for there to be stars even of that calibre. as i kept on driving i noticed it shimmy to my left a little bit, but i'm not sure if that was an illusion as i was still in motion at this point. some trees then blocked my few of it for about 10 seconds, and without turning a corner or anything (i knew where it would be in my eyeline) after the trees revealed the sky again, it had vanished, that was my jaw-drop moment. i then focused very hard to try and see anything around that portion of the sky that it might have been like a plane or copter, but there was nothing there, and the sun was behind me so i could easily see the portion of sky that it was occupying. 

a similar thing happened a few weeks ago while at home in barnsley. it was a similar time in the evening, maybe dusk, a bright yellow light appeared in the sky moving slowly across to my right, i tracked it for about 2 minutes and saw it just fizzle out, this time i had noticed nearby where it faded that there was a large dark helicopter near it's path. i don't know if this had anything to do with it, but it was moving away from my position so it is unlikely it was a searchlight or anything [searchlights aren't usually that yellowy in colour, i should know as i work in lighting as part of my job].

i have read stories about what happens when people start seeing these orbs in the sky and i'm not sure if i like where it is going, although i am still curious.

will report anything else i notice.

keep your eyes in the sky folks :)

awt
content.summary: Bright orb light seen while driving near sheffield. then just completely disappeared.

content.detailedDescription:
Admin, please add this additional file to the witness submission data for case 65946, waterford, mi

(it would be better as a replacement. it has the same content as the original video, but with the original soundtrack and without the leading and trailing text - it's better suited for scientific review))
content.summary: Supplemental information to case 65946, 80 ufos in 2 hours

content.detailedDescription:
1. i was riding in a commercial airplane from phoenix to burbank between 7:30 and 9:30 a.M. the bright light on the vast desert surface caught my attention through the window. 

2. the light came through my window and reflected into my eyes, getting my attention to turn to the window. 

3. at first i thought the light could be a huge flood light, like the kind they use in construction sites at night. 

4. it appeared to be a huge sphere of extremely bright glowing light, hovering over the desert surface, with what appeared to be a search light on the ground below. i stared at the object, trying to take in details and figure out what it was. it was very odd to me that this bright light was the only visible thing in the desert as far as my eyes could see. as the plane i was in traveled past the object, there was a short time i could not see it. but before the wing covered it, it appeared to be moving and becoming 3 separate lights, slightly smaller and less bright than the initial light. when the wing passed over the object and i could see it again, it was 3 lights which appeared to be in a straight line, i was unable to determine the distance between them. the search light on the ground was no longer visible at this point. the objects appeared to either be hovering over the ground, or on the ground at this point, and stationary. the shape and color of the lights remained spherical and white-yellow, however it went from 1 to 3, the 3 appeared smaller and less bright than the initial 1 light. 

5. initially i felt confused as to what this bright light in the middle of nowhere was, and why it was there. i could see no reason for it, nor anything but desert within eye sight from my pov in the plane. i looked around the plane to see if anyone else was observing it so i could ask them what they thought, but all passengers were asleep. there were two soldiers sitting near me, and i wanted to wake them so they could witness it too. after the confusion i felt curious, as i have had many other experiences for years, and wondered if this was another one or something explainable. once the plane passed out of site of the lights i simple remained curious, as the whole thing was an unusual scene. curious enough that i am reporting it to you the next day. i have no feelings about this specific event, but i do of course have feelings from other experiences i have had in the past. 

6. the plane i was flying in flew out of sight of the object(s)/light(s).
content.summary: Single bright light which became 3 bright lights with what looked like a single search light hovering over desert as seen from airplane early morning from phoenix to burbank

content.detailedDescription:
Dec afternoon sitting in hot tub on a clear afternoon. absolutely nothing in the sky & peaceful & extremely quiet. looking up at sky to the west i saw a very large totally solid black object that moved from one side of the sky to the other in a perfect straight line. there were no lights on it & no jetstream, no sound. i've never seen anything like that in my life. however, i didn't have my phone with me or i could have videotaped it as it 
was so clear - not a cloud in the sky. and so quiet. a little eerie in fact. ran into the house but it was gone by the time i reached my phone. so i drew it while it was fresh in my memory. i got on line to look at unusual objects in sky, what balloons look like, got onto mufon site but nothing like what i witnessed. still puzzles me. so curious to see if anyone else saw the same thing or perhaps tell me what i saw..
content.summary: Was sitting in the hot tub in afternoon. totally clear sky & while i was looming at sky this juge black soundless object went in a perfectlt straight line from one side of sky to other quite quickly. was surprised as never witnessed anything like that.

content.detailedDescription:
Driving home from work at about eleven pm, roughly, there was a thunderstorm brewing.  no rain yet, but a lot of lighting.  up in the sky to the north and east of me, i see the lights.  at first i saw four, and they seemed to be in a formation, and slightly drifting.  i was driving about forty five mph, and trying to keep my eye on the back country road, and our region is hilly with many trees.  i kept looking up and though i either saw one light release a smaller light, or there was perhaps another object of the same size further in the distance.  

i lost them behind the tree line, and  when i got to another clearing, i couldnt see them any more.  

note, there is a military base in that general direction.  these were definitely not planes, and i would strongly suggest they werent helicopters.  i have seen plenty of both.
content.summary: Four to five almost halogen orange lights were hovering in the sky.  slight movement, finding formation.  this was at night during a lighting storm.

content.detailedDescription: I noticed a strange light fixture and glow to the south of the grocery store in the corner of orange blossom trail and poinciana blvd, just south of kissimmee fl about 930pm.  once i started driving south on pleasant hill rd i noticed the lights which were in a triangular/squate pattern, hovering right over the north part of lake toho, about 1,500-2,000 ft high. lights were a stadium like orange fluorescent glow, not anything that seemed like a plane nor helicopter, no navigation lights or anything normally seen at night in a flying plane or helicopter. i noticed that the object was slowly heading south and slowly rotating on its axis , but once it i turned into my subdivision, i lost sight over the trees. seems the object was starting to head se , but then it disappeared once i got home and looked towards the lake toho area. never seen anything like it. not easy to dissimulate size since it was dark, possibly about 40-60ft+ across. kissimmee airport is just north of here and im used to seeing cessna's , helicopters and private jets flying in at night and this resembled nothing like a plane. lots of people driving south on pleasant hill rd saw this im sure as i was surrounded by traffic..Very interesting !!
content.summary: 3-4 stadium like florescent orange lights in triange pattern moving south right over lake togo

content.detailedDescription: I was watching the hockey game and observed three lights in the sky towards the ne. they were orangeish in color, they remained at the same brightness for several minutes and then faded out one at a time. i went back into the house to get the dogs for there walk and when i went back outside two lights were visible. i called for my wife to come outside as she had done on the first sighting. again they sustained their glow for a few minutes and faded away. i thought i observed smoke trails above lights but they were not descending, as if held aloft by something. i first thought they were fireworks but they hung in the air too long. maybe military flares?
content.summary: Observed three lights in ne sky

content.detailedDescription: I have been doing research of my own on my sighting. i posted originally on june 2, 2015.  i have been seeing the same lights in the sky every night for the last six months. so i went online and googled ufo sightings boise idaho, and found several video's posted that were from 2013, 2014, and 2015. i will attach two of the video's that i found on youtube, and a picture which is very similar to the one that i included in my second report. there are so many more in the night sky than cannot be caught on camera. you will see a lot of dark screens on the video's where people were clearly seeing more than what the camera could pick up. there are two that are a regular character, because they are low enough, but around them are close to ten objects that you can see clearly with the naked eye. if you are looking for undeniable proof that we are not alone..Come to boise idaho. prepare to be amazed..
content.summary: This ufo event has been occurring over the boise, idaho skies since 2013

content.detailedDescription: I was driving on sr 60 in lake wales, fl when i noticed a triangle of bright lights to the southeast.  i drive to a racetrac gas station and took a few pictures.  i am sorry about the street light in the foreground.  it may give some reference.  the lights were bright and i almost thought i saw the reflection of something metal to the side of the top light of the triangle.  my first impression was a tower, but there are none in that location. several others also noticed this object and wondered what it was. i looked away and when i looked back a second object was there with the first.  it was three vertical lights just to the north of the first.  the first dimmed out in 1 -2 seconds and the second remained.  sighting lasted about 5 min.  the second disappeared while i wasn't looking.
content.summary: Driving in town, observed triangle of lights.  stopped, took pictures,  2nd appeared as 3 vertical lights

content.detailedDescription:
I am a professional photographer. i was in panam√° working for a fitness portfolio. i never noticed the object until 2 days later when i reviewed the images i took, so i did not see it with my own eyes. it simply showed up in the background of one of my shots (attached). the area i was working on is very close to the panama canal and close also to an ex-us airforce base in that country. the city is called veracruz, about 10 minutes away from the city of panama.

the raw file is available for your review if you consider it interesting enough.
content.summary: Gold in color, shaped as a cone with an opening in the middle

content.detailedDescription:
This photograph was taken from my living room desk while listening to #daftpunk random access memories. my eyes were closed and legs crossed on my desk, leaned back in my chair and i opened my eyes and it was right there in view between a narrow opening that i would have missed if i wouldn't have been leaned back & chillin. 

the #etv stayed somewhat stationary as i stared right through it almost in a trance like state, wobbling a little bit for several minutes before disappearing. 

it was truly an amazing experience!
content.summary: Very bright object hovering outside my window

content.detailedDescription:
My attention was first drawn to the object by a man whose son was pointing at something in the sky as i was on my way home. the craft was totally silent and moving slowly in an easterly direction at a height of about 100 to 150 feet up and was about 30 feet in diameter. there were 3 rows of lights on the craft, with small figures visible behind the windows of the lower 2 levels of lights, and had a flashing amber light on the top.This was obviously not a conventional aircraft.
    the craft was visible to me for about 2 minutes before changing direction towards the south and disappearing from my view. it was also witnessed by my 15-year-old daughter and her friend whilst staying at her friends house about a mile away from my location.  
  it was seen by them and their neighbour for about a period of 4 minutes whilst it moved slowly over the sea before disappearing rapidly upwards, again all totally silent.
content.summary: Circular base rising with a 3-tier set of lights to a domed top with flashing amber light.

content.detailedDescription: It was 00.32 hours and we were about to go to bed when i noticed a really bright sparkling light, brighter then i had ever seen before in the sky, i called my partner to look also she said she had never seen anything like it, we first thought it must of been a planet or a really really bright star, but then the brightness started to dull and the object started to move away to the left and in the distance we could see another object the same start to make its way to the same position as the 1st and when that got to the same position it stood still like the 1st. another appeared also and they stopped still no flashing lights just a solid light, then when they started to move they started to flash, the all went in the same direction. we lost sight of them when they went behind the houses to our left.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path then hovering
content.summary: Really bright lights, then faded, blacked out then moved away flashing

content.detailedDescription:
1) playing outside with children
2)felt the urge to look up in that direction
3)airplane
4)three oval shaped discs, light grey in color. the first two were not far from each other then the third came shortly after and moved slower than the first two objects. all three were moving very slowly across the sky and disappeared in thin air.
5) i felt very uncomfortable as i was watching the objects and i felt like i was being watched and i also felt like whatever it was was also watching me. i watched the objects u til they disappeared into the sky.
content.summary: Objects moved across sky much slower than planes and i felt as i was being watch and like it knew i was watching it.

content.detailedDescription: Around 12:40am on may 25, 2015, my daughter and i arrived home after working and we felt that something wasn't right with the environment. we observed the sky and the few clouds that were there moved at a strangely unsteady pace, the moon looked blurry, and there was a breeze that had a feeling of uncertainty attached to it. there are 3 graveyards within a very short walking distance of our home and we frequently go ghost hunting (with great success) so we thought maybe there was something paranormal going on. we walked over to a large, grassy park near the graveyards behind our house. it is an open area with very little light interference at night and there is a great view of the sky. we stood out there for several minutes to try and get a feel for what may be going on and it felt a little creepy, as if we were being watched. all of the sudden i saw a shooting star, then another a couple minutes later. immediately after the second one, i looked to the north/northeast and saw what i thought may be a large airplane in the distance. the only thing that seemed odd was that there were 2 large, bright lights and they were not blinking. i told my daughter to look at it, and it flew at what appeared to be a slow pace (hard to tell in the dark from a distance) in our direction. it appeared to speed up a little and finally got close enough for us to see that it looked like a giant black square. because it was dark out, it was difficult to see any details except for the lights on it. as it flew slowly and quietly (absolutely no sound was made) less than 2 miles above our heads, we noticed that there were 2 large, round bright lights in the front not blinking, one small red light on the bottom blinking very slowly, and 2 large, round bright lights on the back blinking in unison every couple seconds. we started waving our hands and shouting, and the craft slowed down temporarily over our heads, then slowly increased speed again to continue on the straight path it was flying. it flew away at a pace slower than any airplane i have ever seen, and when it got a few miles away, we saw that it had stopped and was hovering. it stayed there for about a minute, then slowly increased speed again, eventually disappearing from our sight, although it was a great distance away when we last saw it, thanks to the large bright lights. as this was happening, we quietly talked here and there about what we were witnessing, but we couldn't really move, which was a result of us being in awe and not because we were frozen by some energy field from the craft. we just didn't want to move. after several minutes when it finally was out of view, we turned and looked at each other, excited about our observation and all i could say was "we just witnessed a ufo!" after that, 2 more shooting stars fell, the second less than a couple minutes behind the first. as far as i know, there was no meteor shower that night, but to see 2 before the craft and 2 after was very interesting. we went home, my daughter went to bed, and i got some water and headed back out. i laid out there in the field for a while but didn't see much of anything else, but i did search the internet a few hours later and found a report from the washington post mentioning a low, slow-flying aircraft that was seen in the area around 1am...They've been here before and they will be back!
content.summary: Square shaped ufo 5.25.15 at 1am

content.detailedDescription: Woke to get a drink of water around 12:30 am. noticed bright light hovering over cathedral basilica of the immaculate conception off colfax ave. looking out my apt window, which faces cathedral basilica of the immaculate conception this object moved back and forth (north, south) then hovered at times and moved up and down right around area of the church over colfax ave.  at first it was bright orange / red then descended behind the buildings and came back around 5 minutes later...   then it starting changing colors from red/orange to green to red. mostly green color and appeared to have a green ring around it. it started moving towards my apt window then turned back and descended behind the buildings again,  could have been a drone..I took some footage through my phone camera but the footage doesn't show how bright the colors were with the naked eye.
content.summary: Drone? type object hovering of capitol hill area - denver

content.detailedDescription: A friend and i saw three orange lights in the shape of a triangle in the sky. we were driving back from a gas station near his house in kissimmee florida around 10:00 pm, during the nhl playoffs on june 8, 2015, when we noticed the lights. from our perspective they appeared to be stationary in the sky, south of our position and his house. each of the lights were orange in color and none were flashing. we were not far from his house (less than 1 min. away), so we rushed to his house. he tried to keep an eye on the lights as i drove and they appeared to descend rather quickly and in a way that seemed uncharacteristic of any known aircraft (they appeared  to move straight down as if it was a single aircraft or maybe 3 moving in formation).We scrambled up onto his roof to watch them, get a video, or take a picture, but they had already vanished. whatever it was did not look like any known aircraft and either moved away from us very quickly or moved straight down in such a way that it would be impossible for any aircraft to replicate. it seemed to be at least twice as big as a commercial plane. judging by the way that it flew and the characteristics of the lights, i am sure that it was not any known aircraft.
content.summary: 3 unwavering lights in a triangle shape. seen hovering, stationary, south of kissimmee florida.

content.detailedDescription:
While taking a photo i saw a beam of light with my peripheral vision so i raised my head and saw the sun covered by a cloud so i took several photos of the same place in an obsessive/compulsive way and the ufo appeared in one of them at 17:03:53, the third one of the same area. it was like i knew someway that something will show up. in the same picture can be seen very tiny lights below and close to the ufo by the trees which are not present in the other pictures. in two other photos close to the sun one tiny light can be seen (17:04:08)and two other lights in a second picture (17:04:12). also in other photo as a reference a bird appeared too (17:04:48).
these picture were taken with a samsung cell phone and were a total of 12 pictures.
content.summary: Static flying black cone shape saucer close to the top of the trees and reflecting the sun light on one side...

content.detailedDescription: My girlfriend sent me this video she capture when she was on her lunch break in houston texas, video is short but if you look closely the light is moving to the right. she also said it came out from behind the cloud that was to the left that's what caught her attention.
content.summary: Moving lights in the sky
